cards.name: Animate Dead
cards.description: Summon 1 (2) shade:Zombie (Zombies) and 2 shade:Skeletons.

cards.name: Careful Cut
cards.description:
Deal 9 (12) damage.
Draw 1 card.
Exhaust a card.

cards.name: Defend
cards.description: Gain 5 (8) Block.

cards.name: Strike
cards.description: Deal 6 (9) damage.

cards.name: Ancient Spear
cards.description:
Deal 21 (29) damage.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Bone Shards
cards.description: Sacrifice up to 2 (3) shade:Skeletons to deal 11 (14) damage each.

cards.name: Bonestorm
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage to all enemies.
Summon 1 (2) shade:Skeleton (Skeletons).

cards.name: Brains
cards.description:
Summon a (two) shade:Zombie (Zombies).
Draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Claw Back
cards.description:
Deal 9 (12) damage.
Return a random shade:Buried card to your draw pile.

cards.name: Coffin Dance
cards.description:
Deal 8 (11) damage.
If your number of undead is even, summon a shade:Skeleton, if odd, summon a shade:Zombie.

cards.name: Command Soldier
cards.description: Summon a shade:Skeleton and trigger up to 3 (8) shade:Skeleton attacks.

cards.name: Extra Limbs
cards.description:
Deal 6 (8) damage 2 times.
When Exhausted, increase the number of strikes by 1 this combat.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Feral Strike
cards.description:
Deal 10 (13) damage to all enemies.
Add a Wound to your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Finger of Death
cards.description:
Deal 10 (13) damage.
If it kills the target, summon 2 shade:Zombies.

cards.name: Flesh To Flesh
cards.description:
Summon 3 (4) shade:Zombies.
Add a Wound to your draw pile.

cards.name: Frenzy
cards.description:
Gain 2 (3) Strength and Dexterity until next turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Fresh Bones
cards.description:
Summon a shade:Skeleton.
Your shade:Skeletons deal 3 more damage for 1 (2) turn (turns).

cards.name: Funerary Armor
cards.description:
Gain 10 (13) Block.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Grave Stillness
cards.description:
Gain 6 (9) Block.
Your shade:Skeletons don't decay this turn.

cards.name: Grey Bargain
cards.description: Return a shade:Buried card to your draw pile by exhausting a card in your hand. (Draw a card.)

cards.name: Premonition
cards.description:
Gain 5 (8) Block.
Whenever you summon a shade:Wraith, move this to your hand from wherever it is.

cards.name: Skeleton Hug
cards.description:
Summon a shade:Skeleton.
Deal 8 (11) damage.
Apply 2 (3) Weak.

cards.name: Trample
cards.description: Deal 4 damage plus 3 (4) for each of your shade:Zombies.

cards.name: Wall of Flesh
cards.description: Summon 2 shade:Zombies and gain 8 (12) Block.

cards.name: Ablative Armor
cards.description: Sacrifice a shade:Zombie to apply 1 (2) Weak to all enemies and gain 1 Dexterity.

cards.name: Asphyxiate
cards.description:
Apply 7 (9) Poison.
Deal damage equal to the enemy's Poison.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Aura of Unlife
cards.description: Increase the decay constant by 2, slowing the decay of your shade:Zombies and shade:Skeletons.

cards.name: Awaken
cards.description:
Before your next turn, choose a shade:Buried card and return it to your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Bite
cards.description:
Deal 7 (9) damage.
Heal 2 (3) HP.

cards.name: Call Wraith
cards.description:
Lose 5 HP.
Summon a shade:Wraith.
Exhaust

cards.name: Call of the Grave
cards.description:
(Innate.)
At the start of your turn, play a random shade:Buried skill and shade:Purge it.

cards.name: Carnophage
cards.description: Whenever you draw a Status or Curse card, summon a shade:Zombie.

cards.name: Cloud of Shrapnel
cards.description:
Sacrifice a shade:Skeleton to deal 8 (12) damage to all enemies and gain 1 Dexterity.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Dangerous Ritual
cards.description:
Deal 20 (26) damage to all enemies.
Costs 1 less per 2 cards Exhausted this combat.

cards.name: Doomsay
cards.description:
Deal 4 (5) damage twice.
Scry 4 (6).

cards.name: Excise
cards.description:
Gain 6 (9) Block.
Exhaust a card. If it's a Status or Curse, gain [E] and draw a card.

cards.name: Flesh Like Oak
cards.description:
Gain 12 (16) Block.
Gain 1 Strength.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Flesh Offering
cards.description:
Summon a shade:Wraith.
Gain 13 (18) Block.
Add 4 Wounds to your discard pile.

cards.name: Funerary Jewels
cards.description:
Gain 3 (5) Block. Draw 1 card.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Go Digging
cards.description: Sacrifice up to 3 (6) shade:Skeletons. Now and at the start of next turn, summon a shade:Zombie for each one sacrificed.

cards.name: Haruspicy
cards.description:
Scry 5 (6) and draw 2 (3) cards.
Sacrifice a shade:Zombie or lose 4 HP.

cards.name: Lye Bath
cards.description:
Convert all your shade:Zombies into shade:Skeletons (and draw a card).
Gain 1 Strength for every 3 shade:Zombies.

cards.name: Open Graves
cards.description:
Summon  (a shade:Skeleton.Summon )
 either a shade:Zombie or a shade:Skeleton at the beginning of your turn, alternating.

cards.name: Patience
cards.description:
Retain (.)
 (Retain) your hand and your unspent energy this turn.

cards.name: Potion of Madness
cards.description:
Gain 3 (4) Strength.
Decrease the decay constant by 1, speeding up the decay of your shade:Zombies and shade:Skeletons.

cards.name: Pound of Flesh
cards.description:
Deal 12 (15) damage.
Next turn, summon 2 (3) shade:Zombies.

cards.name: Press the Attack
cards.description:
Deal 3 (6) damage.
Summon 2 shade:Skeletons.
Your shade:Skeletons deal 3 more damage for 2 (3) turns.

cards.name: Ravenous Horde
cards.description:
Lose 2 HP.
Summon 2 X  (+ 1) shade:Zombies.

cards.name: Ritual Offering
cards.description:
Exhaust up to 2 cards from your draw pile.
 (Draw a card.)
Exhaust.

cards.name: Sanguine Ritual
cards.description:
Lose 2 HP.
Gain [E] [E] ( [E]).
Exhaust.

cards.name: Scuttling Hand
cards.description:
Deal 4 (6) damage.
When you play a card with Exhaust, return this from the discard pile to your hand.

cards.name: Sense Prey
cards.description:
(Innate.)
Summon a shade:Zombie and a shade:Skeleton for each enemy in combat.
Exhaust~~- . -~~

cards.name: Skeleton Army
cards.description: Summon 5 (7) shade:Skeletons.

cards.name: Soul Toxin
cards.description:
Apply 2 (3) Weak.
Target loses 3 (5) HP.
If you have a shade:Wraith, apply 15 (25) Poison.

cards.name: Spectral Strikes
cards.description:
(Innate.)
When you play an attack containing "Strike," shade:Purge it, draw a card, and gain 1 Strength.

cards.name: Spontaneous Ritual
cards.description:
(Add 3 Dazed to your hand.)
Exhaust your hand.
Deal damage equal to the number of cards Exhausted this combat.

cards.name: Stitch Together
cards.description: The next time you draw a Status or Curse card, Exhaust it, draw a card, and heal 7 (10) HP.

cards.name: Vengeful Dead
cards.description: At the start of your turn, play a random shade:Buried attack and shade:Purge (return) it (to your discard pile).

cards.name: Consume
cards.description:
Exhaust the top 3 (4) cards of your deck.
Add 3 (4) Wounds to your discard pile.
Deal 21 (28) damage to all enemies.

cards.name: Coordination
cards.description: Your shade:Skeletons' attacks ~~- hit  -~~ all enemies. (Trigger up to 2 shade:Skeleton attacks.)

cards.name: Dark of Night
cards.description: Your next card (two)  (cards) that Exhausts (Exhaust) this turn is (are) played twice.

cards.name: Ethereal Offering
cards.description: The next time you Exhaust 3 (2) cards in one turn, summon a shade:Wraith.

cards.name: Greater Animation
cards.description:
Summon 1 shade:Zombie, 2 shade:Skeletons, and 1 shade:Wraith~~- , but lose 1 Strength and 1 Dexterity -~~ .
shade:Purge.

cards.name: Last Gasp
cards.description:
~~- Ethereal. -~~
Choose a shade:Buried card, play it, and shade:Purge it.

cards.name: Lich Form
cards.description: At the start of your turn, summon 3 (4) shade:Skeletons.

cards.name: Lose Control
cards.description:
Add 2 Wounds to your discard pile.
Draw 3 (4) cards.

cards.name: Lunar Madness
cards.description:
(Retain.)
Summon 8 shade:Skeletons.
After your shade:Skeletons attack this turn, they attack you.

cards.name: Ominous Ritual
cards.description:
(Add 3 Dazed to your hand.)
Gain Block and deal damage to all enemies equal to the number of cards Exhausted this combat.

cards.name: One Is Enough
cards.description:
Sacrifice all your undead for 5 (6) Block each.
Deal 10 (13) damage X times.

cards.name: Putrefaction
cards.description: Whenever a shade:Zombie dies, apply 2 Poison to all enemies.

cards.name: Self-burial
cards.description:
Return all shade:Buried cards to your deck by exhausting your hand and next 15 cards.
Draw 3 (5) cards.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Soul Pierce
cards.description: Your shade:Wraiths deal 40 (60) more damage.

cards.name: Tombstone
cards.description:
Deal 36 (48) damage.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Unbar the Grave
cards.description:
Summon 2 (3) shade:Zombies and 2 (3) shade:Skeletons.
Return 2 (3) random shade:Buried cards to your draw pile.
Exhaust.

relics.name: Yorick's Skull
relics.description: Start each combat with a shade:Zombie. Whenever you play 10 cards, summon a shade:Zombie.

relics.name: Thing
relics.description: When you return a shade:Buried card to your hand or deck, gain 3 Block.

relics.name: Yorick's Polished Skull
relics.description: Start each combat with a shade:Zombie and 2 shade:Skeletons. Whenever you play 10 cards, summon a shade:Zombie and a shade:Skeleton.

keywords.name: Buried
keywords.description: A class card (not Colorless, Status, or Curse) from your exhaust pile.

keywords.name: Purge
keywords.description: Removed from play until the end of combat.

keywords.name: Skeleton
keywords.description: Undead that deal damage at the end of your turn.

keywords.name: Unearth
keywords.description: Move a card from your exhaust pile.

keywords.name: Wraith
keywords.description: Undead that render you intangible if attacked, and deal damage if not.

keywords.name: Zombie
keywords.description: Undead that sacrifice themselves to block for you.

mods.name: Shade Mod
mods.description: Adds the Shade character to the game. Art credits to CausticImp and all the other mods we borrowed art from.
